column3: Hi there, a mere human. I’m the guardian of this place. Please me or else you wouldn’t be able to get out of this place HAHAHAHA
What is this place? I just want to get out of here.
You know, this place is full of mysteries. A lot of people have tried to pass me, but no one did.
You should be careful when you’re talking to me
or else you might be trapped here forever with me MUWAHAHA.
Now! Tell me what you want so we can finish this now!
